lessons.lesson: Lesson 1 几个学生 How many students?

sentences.pinyin: Nǐ yǒu jǐ ge xuéshēng?
sentences.english: How many students do you have?

sentences.pinyin: Wǒ yǒu èrshí wǔ ge xuéshēng.
sentences.english: I have twenty-five students.

sentences.pinyin: Tāmen dōu shì dàrén ba?
sentences.english: Are they all adults?

sentences.chinese: 不一定，有大人，也有小孩。
sentences.pinyin: Bù yīdìng, yǒu dàrén, yě yǒu xiǎo hái.
sentences.english: Not all of them. Some are adults and some are children.

sentences.pinyin: Yǒu nǚshēng ma?
sentences.english: Are there any female students?

sentences.chinese: 有，一半是女生，一半是男生。
sentences.pinyin: Yǒu, yī bàn shì nǚ shēng, yī bàn shì nán shēng.
sentences.english: Yes, half are girls and half are boys.

sentences.pinyin: Nǐ yǒu jǐ zhī bǐ?
sentences.english: How many pens do you have?

sentences.pinyin: Nǐ yǒu jǐ zhī bǐ?
sentences.english: How many pens do you have?

sentences.pinyin: Wǒ yǒu liù zhī bǐ.
sentences.english: I have six pens.

sentences.pinyin: Dōu shì máobǐ ma?
sentences.english: Are they all writing brushes?

sentences.chinese: 不都是，两支是毛笔，四支原子笔。
sentences.pinyin: Bù dōu shì, liǎng zhī shì máo bǐ, sì zhī yuánzǐ bǐ.
sentences.english: Not all of them. Two of them are writing brushes, and four are ballpoint pens.

sentences.pinyin: Nǐ yǒu jǐ běn shū?
sentences.english: How many books do you have?

sentences.chinese: 我有二十本书，一半是中文的。
sentences.pinyin: Wǒ yǒu èrshí běn shū, yī bàn shì zhōngwén de.
sentences.english: I have twenty books. Half are in Chinese, and half are in English.

lessons.lesson: Lesson 2 学校 真大 The school is big

sentences.pinyin: Zhè suǒ xuéxiào yǒu duōshǎo xuéshēng?
sentences.english: How many students are there in this school?

sentences.pinyin: Yǒu liǎng qiān wǔ bǎi duō gè xuéshēng.
sentences.english: There are about 2,500 students.

sentences.pinyin: Zhè suǒ xuéxiào zhēn bù xiǎo.
sentences.english: This school is quite big.

sentences.pinyin: Shì a, zhè shì suǒ dà xuéxiào.
sentences.english: Yes, this is a big school.

sentences.chinese: 学校里有没有外国学生？
sentences.pinyin: Xuéxiào lǐ yǒu méiyǒu wàiguó xuéshēng?
sentences.english: Are there any foreign students in this school?

sentences.pinyin: Wàiguó xuéshēng hěnduō.
sentences.english: There are many foreign students.

sentences.chinese: 学校有很多外国学生，是吗？
sentences.pinyin: Xuéxiào yǒu hěn duō wàiguó xuéshēng, shì ma?
sentences.english: There are many foreign students at the school, aren't there?

sentences.pinyin: Shì a, yǒu hěn duō.
sentences.english: Yes, there are a lot.

sentences.pinyin: Bǐ běnguó xuéshēng hái duō ma?
sentences.english: More than local students?

sentences.pinyin: Bù, bǐ běnguó xuéshēng shǎo.
sentences.english: No, less than local students.

sentences.pinyin: Nánshēng gēn nǚshēng yīyàng duō ma?
sentences.english: Are there as many boys as girls?

sentences.pinyin: Chà bù duō yīyàng duō.
sentences.english: Boys and girls are almost the same amount.

sentences.pinyin: Qǐng wèn guì xìng?
sentences.english: May I ask your name?

sentences.pinyin: Wǒ xìng wáng, jiào shì píng.
sentences.english: My last name is Wang, my first name is Shiping.

sentences.chinese: 我叫林大中，那位努什是谁？
sentences.pinyin: Wǒ jiào líndàzhōng, nà wèi nǔ shén shì shéi?
sentences.english: I am called Lin Dazhong. Who is that lady?

sentences.chinese: 她是李有年的太太，来，我给你们介绍。
sentences.pinyin: Tā shì lǐ yǒunián de tàitài, lái, wǒ gěi nǐmen jièshào.
sentences.english: She is Mrs. Li, You Nian's wife. Come, let me introduce you.

sentences.chinese: 我叫林大中，是幼年的同学。
sentences.pinyin: Wǒ jiào lín dà zhōng, shì yòu nián de tóngxué.
sentences.english: My name is Lin Dazhong, I am a childhood friend.

sentences.pinyin: Hěn gāoxìng rènshí nǐ.
sentences.english: Nice to meet you.

lessons.lesson: Lesson 5 学了多久了 How long have you studied?

sentences.pinyin: Nǐ xué zhōngwén duō jiǔle?
sentences.english: How long have you studied Chinese?

sentences.chinese: 我才学了两个月，你学了多久了？
sentences.pinyin: Wǒ cái xué le liǎng gè yuè, nǐ xué le duō jiǔ le?
sentences.english: I've only studied for two months. How long have you been studying?

sentences.pinyin: Wǒ yǐ jīng xuéle sān niánle.
sentences.english: I have already studied for three years.

sentences.pinyin: Wǒ hái me xué ne.
sentences.english: I haven't started yet.

sentences.chinese: 没关系，你可以到这里来学。
sentences.pinyin: Méiguānxì, nǐ kě yǐ dào zhè lǐ lái xué.
sentences.english: That's okay, you can come here to learn.
